class.name: GameplayTagContainer
class.brief_description: A resource that stores a collection of gameplay tags.
class.description: The [GameplayTagContainer] stores a collection of unique tags (StringNames) and provides methods for efficient querying and hierarchical comparison. Can be used to define tag requirements for abilities or effects.

method.name: add_container
method.description: Adds all tags from another container to this one.

method.name: add_tag
method.description: Adds a tag to the container.

method.name: get_tags
method.description: Returns all tags currently in the container.

method.name: has_all
method.description: Returns true if this container has ALL tags from the other container.

method.name: has_any
method.description: Returns true if this container has ANY tags from the other container.

method.name: has_tag
method.description: Returns true if the container has the exact tag.

method.name: has_tag_hierarchical
method.description: Returns true if the container has the tag or any parent tag in the hierarchy.

method.name: remove_tag
method.description: Removes a tag from the container.
